Yes, the resort staff can definitely assist guests in locating the water refill stations. Here are some ways the staff can help:

1. Provide information at check-in: At check-in, the staff can provide guests with a map of the resort that highlights the location of the water refill stations.

2. Staff training: Train staff members to be familiar with the location of the water refill stations and encourage them to inform guests about their use.

3. Signage: Install clear, visible signage throughout the resort that directs guests to the water refill stations.

4. Remind guests: During guest interactions, staff can remind guests about the water refill stations and encourage them to use them.

5. Personalize refill stations: Some refill stations may have more than one type of nozzle, so the staff can personalize the instructions to each guest based on their preferred bottle type.

By assisting guests in locating the water refill stations, resort staff can help reduce plastic waste while promoting a sustainable and eco-friendly atmosphere.
